name: RND Chat AI – Content Generator
author: Rnd Experts

sections.description:
With RND Chat AI plugin, generate content, select the writing tone, writing style, let you organize everything in templates, quickly suggest titles and excerpts, and much more!
=> You just only need to enter the title of the content
=> Rewrite the content
=> Get the content in multilanguage
=> Select the content writing tone
=> Select the content writing style
=> Easy to customize
=> Easy to change the color scheme

Add a ChatGPT-style chatbot
=> Generate fresh and engaging content for your site
=> Get the content in multilanguage
=> Select the content writing tone
=> Select the content writing style
=> Explore the AI Playground for a variety of tools like translation, correction, SEO, etc
=> Train your AI to make it better at specific tasks
=> Quickly write the WooCommerce product content, posts content, pages content, etc
=> optimize the Generated the content
=> Work With all Version of WordPress
=> Works with all versions of PHP from v5.2 onwards
=> No Effect on the SEO Settings
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the shortcode [vcwai_chat_gpt_embed] in your page
sections.faq:
How to get the original content

Its depend upon your input that how you want the content, if you don’t want duplicate content, then enter like “Write a 600 Words plagiarism free content on …Your title here..”

From where I can get the OpenAI API keys

You need to register your self to here https://openai.com/blog/openai-api/

Can I generate the content in different language?

Yes, you can generate the content in different languages.

What other features this plugin offers?

With this plugin you can generate the content in different languages, select the content tone, select the writing stype.

Can I use the shortcode for this?

You you can put this shortcode to any page [vcwai_chat_gpt_embed]
